issue.title: [C++] Add Tensor::CountNonZero
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-4318](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4318). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
I would like to move CountNonZero defined in SparseTensorConverter into Tensor class, and add tests for this function.

The pull-request is <https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3452>.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-4318?focusedCommentId=16762979) by Antoine Pitrou (apitrou):*
Issue resolved by pull request 3452
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3452>
